MONEY LEAK ANALYSIS
================================================================

This is your BIGGEST money leak by far!

- Claude.AI: $213.80 - That's potentially $855/month!
- Multiple tech subscriptions adding up
- This alone is 60% of your weekly spending

ACTION: Review if you need all these subscriptions.
Are you using Claude.AI enough to justify $855/month?

================================================================

- Weekly: $477.57

- Weekly: $263.77
- Monthly: $1,139/month (Save $922/month!)

ACTION PLAN - IMMEDIATE
================================================================

[ ] URGENT: Review Claude.AI subscription ($213.80)
    - Is this a mistake/double charge?
    - Do you need the Pro plan, or can you downgrade?
    - Cancel if not using it actively

[ ] Check other software subscriptions:
    - Anthropic ($26.73) - is this separate from Claude?
    - Slack ($18/month) - do you need paid plan?
    - FL Cloud ($16.02) - still using this?
    - Twilio ($10.71) - active project?

[ ] Meal prep this weekend:
    - Could save $30-40/week
    - Bring lunch to work/school

[ ] Find your bank's ATM locations:
    - Avoid $2-3 fees per withdrawal


KEY INSIGHTS
================================================================

GOOD:
- Only $1.90 in convenience store spending
- Grocery shopping instead of eating out mostly
- Not many impulse purchases

NEEDS ATTENTION:
